author: HemantMahawar

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body:
Can you rebase to get rid of the merge commit?

Also, this doesn't really specify _what_ documents should be considered internal. Since PowerShell will be open-source... I can't actually think of any documentation that we wouldn't want to publish.

comments.author: joeyaiello
comments.body: @andschwa: For instance, the governance paper I wrote last week. Or marketing stuff. Or our strategy longer-term. As opposed to documenting the build, testing process, execution, packaging, public roadmap, breaking changes contract, etc.

comments.author: HemantMahawar
comments.body: @andschwa ... Thanks for reminding about rebase ... done.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: LGTM. Build failures are due to forks not having access tokens.

title: Added a readme to clarify where internal vs. public documents should go
